Phrase en Français: The ${item-singular: 7[2]} can be duplicated further by those who have received a copy, essentially allowing for an unlimited number of ${item-plural: 7[2]} to be made. However, the moment the maximum allowable number of players have entered Dynamis, all extra hourglasses will become void. Please take this into consideration when deciding to whom, and how many, copies are to be handed out.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Please note that it is not possible to enter Dynamis - ${choice: 0}[Dummy/San d'Oria/Bastok/Windurst/Jeuno/Beaucedine/Xarcabard/Valkurm/Buburimu/Qufim/Tavnazia] without ${keyitem-article: 5[2]}, even if you trade the required ${item-singular: 7[2]}.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: In addition, only players above level 64 can travel to the Shrouded Land.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Dynamis - ${choice: 0}[Dummy/San d'Oria/Bastok/Windurst/Jeuno/Beaucedine/Xarcabard/Valkurm/Buburimu/Qufim/Tavnazia] will not be reserved to anyone. It will be accessible to any and all who meet the entry requirements.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Examine them and you will be granted entrance to the corresponding Dynamis area.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Your stay in Dynamis - ${choice: 0}[Dummy/San d'Oria/Bastok/Windurst/Jeuno/Beaucedine/Xarcabard/Valkurm/Buburimu/Qufim/Tavnazia] will be subject to a time restriction. Parties will automatically be expelled from the area when this time elapses.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Remember that only players level 65 or above can travel to the Shrouded Land.${prompt}
